attributes.action: Publicly acknowledge the excellent services to the British Public by John Wick.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
John Wick and his "anonymous source" have shown great moral fibre in exposing the shameful expenses scandal by 'some' of our MP's.

These same MP's are our representatives and have used 'our' money to enhance 'their' lifestyles.

Well done

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
